text: Richard A. Dysart (March 30, 1929 - April 5, 2015) was an American actor. He was best known for his role as Leland McKenzie on the NBC legal drama L.A. Law. Dysart was born in Boston, Massachusetts. He won an Emmy Award in 1992.Richard Dysart Academy of Television Arts & Sciences Dysart died at home in Santa Monica, California after a long illness, aged 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Richard Dysart at Internet Off-Broadway Database Category:1929 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from Boston Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Disease-related deaths in California Category:Emmy Award winning actors
title: Richard Dysart
